tool_description: Routes transactions to appropriate payment gateways based on card type, amount, geography, and gateway availability.

card_type.description: Type of card (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, etc.)

backup_required.description: Whether backup gateway selection is required

error_messages: No available gateways: No payment gateways available for this card type and region combination.
Invalid card type: Unsupported card type for gateway routing.
Invalid currency: Currency not supported by available gateways.
Gateway selection failed: Unable to select appropriate gateway based on provided criteria.
Preferred gateway unavailable: Specified preferred gateway is not available or suitable.
usage: Provide transaction details including card_type, amount, currency, customer_country, and merchant_id. Optionally specify preferred_gateway and backup_required preferences.

estimated_fees.description: Estimated processing fees for this gateway
